import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./Navbar.css';import NavItem from'../NavItem/NavItem';import navData from'../../Data/nav.json';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';// Functional Component
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=props=>{const locations=useLocation();const[showNavBar,setShowNavBar]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{locations.pathname==='/'||locations.pathname==='/favourite'?setShowNavBar(true):setShowNavBar(false);},[locations]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:showNavBar?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"bottom-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"navUl",children:navData.map(nav=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{navitem:nav},nav.id))})}):''});};export default Navbar;
